thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 16 of 1307
thread.title: todd
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by todd

author: todd
title: todd
text: service desk salesman was polite and helpful gave us an outstanding deal on 4 mastercraft All terrain tires for my jeep liberty. I have been a faithful customer of this company since the early 1990s and this company is the only tire company I deal with, I appreciate that they look out for the customer and try hard to pass savings on to us and not try to push the most expensive product on the sales floor. I will continue to be a customer gladly, keep up the great work
